query: SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 0; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS sales; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS affiliates; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS trackingLinks; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS coupons; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS orders; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS products; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS stores; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS users; SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 1;
